input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product specification information.

Product specification:
Product specification:
DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, 405-Yard, Size 20, Black

Product specifications:
Perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more
Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish
It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius)
Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed
Highly colorfast
Available in black color
Measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Introducing DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, the ultimate choice for all your fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies, and much more! This luxurious cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton, giving it a smooth and silky finish that is perfect for all your crochet projects. At 1.76 ounces and measuring 405 yards in length, this cotton comes in size 20 and is available in a stunning black color.
 What sets Cebelia apart is its high colorfastness, allowing you to wash your projects with confidence. You can machine wash your items at a maximum temperature of 203 Fahrenheit (95 Celsius), and you can even tumble dry, bleach, dry clean, or steam them! Create beautiful and long-lasting crochet pieces with DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton. Order now and experience the difference!
input_text.Response B: DMC Cebelia Crochet Cotton is a high quality 100% cotton yarn. It is perfect for crochet projects such as fashion garments, bedspreads, tablecloths, doilies and more. The yarn is double mercerized and combed for a smooth and silky finish. It is highly colorfast and machine washable, and can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. The yarn comes in a wide range of colors and measures 405 yards in length.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
